attributes.action: require all MPs who have stated their intention to stand down at the next election due to the Expenses Scandal to do so immediately and forfeit any severance payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The number of MPs resigning (but not really) who intend to remain in post until the next general election, who have resigned because of the furore over the abuse of MP Expenses has now reached double figures.
These MPs should be forced to resign with immediate effect.  It is not appropriate that they should keep their post, keep claiming their salary and claim severance and relocation benefits, in some cases totalling over £100,000 per MP

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
